Query: How to Zip and Unzip a directory and its files in Linux

Top-3 Similar Questions: ul_321683: Unzip all files into directories with the same name

ul_321683: for d in *.zip
do
  dir=/home/usrname/anotherdir/zip${d%%.zip}
  unzip -d "$dir" "$d"
done

ul_586576: for file in *.zip; do
    [ -f "$file" ] || continue
    unzip "$file" -d "${file%%.zip}"
done
